entry.name: command
entry.label: Command to execute
entry.default: if [ -x "$(command -v qdbus6)" ]; then qdbus6 org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin invokeShortcut Overview; elif [ -x "$(command -v qdbus)" ]; then qdbus org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin invokeShortcut Overview; elif [ -x "$(command -v qdbus5)" ]; then qdbus5 org.kde.kglobalaccel /component/kwin invokeShortcut Overview; fi
